content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case that has been ongoing for 22 years the judge has ruled in favor of the plaintiff d pa gi co te and has declared the defendant co te in default the judge has also declared the succession of d pa vi and has adopted a division plan for the hereditary property the judge has resolved the dispute regarding the plaintiffs claim for access to a solar slab and rejected their claim for exclusive use of an apartment the judge has rejected a counterclaim brought by d pa se the case was initiated in 1995 and has involved disputes over access to certain parts of the property and payment of utilities the judge has determined the division plan proposed by the courtappointed expert to be correct the case will continue for further activities as provided by the civil procedure code the ruling was made on july 23 2012 and filed with the court on september 6 2012

metadata.disputed_issues: access to certain parts of the property
